name: Quarantine Zone Management
description: Training in establishing and enforcing effective quarantine zones to limit pathogen spread.

cards.title: Establishing a Secure Quarantine Zone
cards.description: Techniques for setting up controlled containment areas to restrict pathogen spread.
cards.bulletpoints: Zoning protocols, air filtration, entry/exit decontamination
cards.summaryText: Lock down zones with layered barriers, filtered airflow, and strict decon so nothing leaks out.

cards.title: Psychological and Social Management in Quarantine
cards.description: Handling panic, misinformation, and public compliance during quarantine operations.
cards.bulletpoints: Crisis communication, misinformation countermeasures, morale maintenance
cards.summaryText: Stabilize morale, counter rumors, and keep communication clear so quarantined populations stay cooperative.

cards.title: Medical Triage & Resource Allocation in Quarantine Zones
cards.description: Effective triage and resource distribution strategies for high-risk containment areas.
cards.bulletpoints: Priority care levels, medical supply rationing, decision-making under crisis
cards.summaryText: Run crisis triage, ration supplies, and make fast calls so limited resources save the most lives inside quarantine.
